channel.title: Auxy Podcast!
channel.description:
Today, I present to you the first ever....
Auxy Podcast!
Introducing Auxcasts,
a series of interviews, contests, news flashes, debates, and more! Come along and listen to artists such as Hexx, Mr. Serpent, HAYVN, Polar, and HELIXX, along with (hopefully) a couple guest stars, have a serious discussion about what snack food they like to eat while doing auxy. Our first podcast has been brought to you by Hexx and Mr. Serpent, and goes through a basic rundown plus a short cross-interview QnA. Links to both the interview and the profile itself are posted below!
We'd really appreciate it if you could show some support by following Auxcasts and giving our podcast a like or repost.
And just so everyone knows, neither Hexx nor I know how to run one of these things, so you''ll hear a lot of unprofessionalism throughout the entire podcast. I do apologize for the -50% quality of the audio and constant breaks and pauses due to Discord being a total bloombugger.
Anyways, that's just about it! All aboard the hype train 'cause this is about to GET REAL!!
https://soundcloud.com/auxcasts
https://soundcloud.com/auxcasts/podcast-1

item.title: Auxy Podcast!
item.dc:creator: MrSerpent
item.description:
Let me know if you want to guest star in the podcast, currently looking for a producer for podcast number two.

Also, if you have any suggestions for what the prize should be for a contest/giveaway or any news feel free to PM me or send me a message on discord

My discord: Señor Serpent#5937

I’m really excited you guys like the podcast! I greatly appreciate your feedback, and I’d love to make more of these guest starring you guys!

Read full topic

I might consider getting the 99$ one, but I think I should probably settle for one better for podcasts and not band concerts.

I don’t know what I want at the moment

item.title: Auxy Podcast!
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Sure, Shure’s are great, but you sure don’t need a Shure to get the job done.

This Neewer works fine, and is really cheap: https://www.amazon.com/Neewer-Professional-Broadcasting-Microphone-Adjustable/dp/B00XOXRTX6/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1513911198&sr=8-2&keywords=neewer+nw-700
